summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGet lash extension hype with e.l.f. Cosmetics' Lash XTNDR Mascara. This lengthening mascara uses lightweight tubing technology to wrap each eyelash and visibly extend the look of lashes beyond their natural length. The tapered silicone brush grips and separates each lash for instant drama.
details: DetailsBenefitsLong-lasting, lengthening mascara creates the look of lash extensionsTubing technology wraps lashes in lightweight tubes for instant, buildable lengthFlexible, tapered silicone brush grips & separates each lashClump, flake & smudge-resistant formulaEasy to remove without scrubbingEnriched with 5% jojoba seed oil to nourish & condition lashes100% vegan & cruelty-free, e.l.f. is Leaping Bunny Certifiede.l.f. is proud to partner with Fair Trade USA & manufacture products in Fair Trade Certified facilities; look for the Fair Trade Certified seal on your e.l.f. productResearch Results97% of users saw instant & dramatic length*91% of users agreed mascara created the look of lash extensions*91% of users agreed added length lasted throughout the day**In a consumer perception studyFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensNonylphenol ethoxylatesTriclosanTriclocarbanHydroquinoneItem 2622894How To UsePosition mascara wand at the base of your lashes and sweep through slowly to coat from root to tip.To build your desired length, layer at the tips before lashes dry.Easily remove tubing mascara by gently massaging lashes with warm water or e.l.f. SKIN's Holy Hydration! Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm (sold separately).IngredientsPitch Black: Water (Aqua), Acrylates Copolymer, Synthetic Beeswax, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cera, PVP, Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Butylene Glycol, Laureth-21, Trideceth-6 Phosphate, Dipropylene Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77499).Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product.
how_to_use: Position mascara wand at the base of your lashes and sweep through slowly to coat from root to tip.To build your desired length, layer at the tips before lashes dry.Easily remove tubing mascara by gently massaging lashes with warm water or e.l.f. SKIN's Holy Hydration! Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm (sold separately).

reviews.headline: Would not buy again.
reviews.comments: Doesn't do much of anything.

reviews.headline: This product is great
reviews.comments: This product last a long time doesn't flake or clump looks great on lashes comes of easy (if you try to take it off) also if you have ever worn a mascara that wasn't waterproof and cried it's smears this one does not.

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: In all the decades I've been wearing mascara, I've never tried one that is this "wimpy" on my eyelashes. I can barely tell that I'm wearing it. It did not "extend" my eyelashes as advertised- not even a little bit.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: My grand daughter and I both love this mascara.  Wears great and comes of like a breeze.  Will be elf again

reviews.headline: Great tubing mascara!! So much length
reviews.comments: Reminds me of Thrive mascara but for a much better price!

reviews.headline: Stood up to 4+ hours of fursuiting!
reviews.comments: I am a furry with a full fursuit! I attended an event and suited for about four hours this weekend. I wore a full face of makeup and this was the only product that held up the entire time. Four hours of sweating and taking my head on and off throughout. Everything else wore off, but this mascara held up without a streak or flake. I would highly recommend this mascara to anyone, but especially anyone that has to do rigorous activity and has to look fierce afterwards! I've also wore it swimming with the same result! Better than blinc and less than half the price!

reviews.headline: Will be buying this again!!
reviews.comments: I was looking for an excellent rated mascara and this mascara was it. It goes on smooth, doesn't clump or flake. Makes the lashes long and separated. Will buy again.

reviews.headline: Yes I would buy this product over and over
reviews.comments: I love this for my personal eyelashes, it's absolutely great!

reviews.headline: Sadly, it made me itch!  Will be returning.
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this as elf products are so much cheaper than what I currently use.  Sadly, it made me itch.  More sad, because this mascara goes on great, stays all day, and comes off easily.  I'm very sensitive so if you are not, then give this a try

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: Usually a bog fan of all things elf but this one fell flat for me. It os a very dey formula even after trying to warm it up in my hands. Washing it off is fairly easy but it dies not come off in "tubes" like other tubing mascaras i have used. Great orice point and i wanted to love it but it needs work.

reviews.headline: Crumbles?
reviews.comments: Within a couple of hours of application it's on my lower eyelids and cheeks.

reviews.headline: My new favorite mascara!
reviews.comments: My sister recommended this mascara to me, and it did not disappoint! The brush allows the mascara to go on with no clumps. This mascara doesn't smudge or flake at all, it's awesome. To take it off I just use an oil cleanser and it comes off easy!

reviews.headline: love
reviews.comments: doesn't flake all day

reviews.headline: not bad
reviews.comments: very affordable, but not as good as some of the more expensive tube mascaras

reviews.headline: my favorite mascara
reviews.comments: great mascara

reviews.headline: loveeee it
reviews.comments: i have combination skin + rosacea (sensitive), and i love this mascara so much. my eyelids are super oily and my mascara has always smudged, even with waterproof mascara. this tubing mascara was recommended to me by a friend and has really changed the game for me. it's super easy to lengthen your lashes and it does not smudge whatsoever. removal is very simple, it comes off easily with my regular face wash alone. it causes no irritation around my eyes and feels very lightweight. the applicator is very simple, but the formula completely makes up for it. highly recommend!!

reviews.headline: good, but dry
reviews.comments: bought this in brown to try as an everyday, subtle look that doesn't smudge. my first tubing product in maybe 10 years, it does well enough, but the formula is pretty dry and the brush is stiff so it is a little rough feeling on the lid when I apply. happy with it for the price, but I'm not sure I would repurchase, I'll likely try a different brand with a tubing formula next.

reviews.headline: Tubing mascara? or answer to my mascara prayers?
reviews.comments: This is such a good tubing mascara!! The price is great and so is the wear. Since I've been trying/using different mascaras since I was a preteen and have always had most products smudge or flake on me. It's gives me super beautiful length and a ~hint~ of volume. The black is black and the brown isn't visibly very brown, more natural and lighter looking than the pitch black, love both colors. I typically have a little bit of oliy eyelids so most traditional mascara smudge above and below my lashes, especially if im exercising or if it's hot summer weather. THIS! This tubing mascara does NOT smudge or flake the whole day! I've only tried this tubing mascara, but I'd say this formula isn't super wet and gets a lil dryer but not much, its a good middle ground. To remove the mascara I've learned to really make sure to FULLY cover my lashes with water and give it a minute to completely soften, then it slides off easily! It has really helped my lashes to fall out less compared to non tubing. The only downside is if you want your mascara to keep a curl realllyyy good. It's ok but not great for holding a curl (trick is to GENTTLLY use your curler after its dried ;) ) I would absolutely buy this again! Highly highly recommend if you've been wanting to try a tubing mascara!

reviews.headline: Gift for a tween
reviews.comments: This was part of a series of gifts for a tween.  She was very ecstatic about her new mascara.

reviews.headline: For the people with  very oily eye lids
reviews.comments: Oh my god. I have finally found a mascara that doesn't smear on my bottom lash line. I have very oily skin so of course my eyelids are oily ( the struggle is real). Wore it all day not smeared on my eyelids or my under eye, was so surprised. This is my new favorite mascara. Now I dont have worry about my mascara smered over my eyes at the end of the day. Will buy again.

faceoff_positive.comments: This is such a good tubing mascara!! The price is great and so is the wear. Since I've been trying/using different mascaras since I was a preteen and have always had most products smudge or flake on me. It's gives me super beautiful length and a ~hint~ of volume. The black is black and the brown isn't visibly very brown, more natural and lighter looking than the pitch black, love both colors. I typically have a little bit of oliy eyelids so most traditional mascara smudge above and below my lashes, especially if im exercising or if it's hot summer weather. THIS! This tubing mascara does NOT smudge or flake the whole day! I've only tried this tubing mascara, but I'd say this formula isn't super wet and gets a lil dryer but not much, its a good middle ground. To remove the mascara I've learned to really make sure to FULLY cover my lashes with water and give it a minute to completely soften, then it slides off easily! It has really helped my lashes to fall out less compared to non tubing. The only downside is if you want your mascara to keep a curl realllyyy good. It's ok but not great for holding a curl (trick is to GENTTLLY use your curler after its dried ;) ) I would absolutely buy this again! Highly highly recommend if you've been wanting to try a tubing mascara!
faceoff_positive.headline: Tubing mascara? or answer to my mascara prayers?

faceoff_negative.comments: I recognize that different things work for different people, but I am baffled how this would work well for anyone. I've tried at least 6 tubing mascaras at different price points, and this is the worst by a mile. This flaked on me from the first use. I cant get my eyelashes as long or full as other tubing mascaras before they get clumpy. I have naturally curly lashes that I never have to curl, and this actually straightened my lashes. I only saw a minor improvement in how they held a curl after curling them and doing a bunch of tricks I got from people with straight lashes. I even tried using a couple different styles of wands to no avail. The top of the tube was completley gunky with partially-dried mascara after just a few uses. I had to clean it off ao I didnt get chunks on the wand. This is only managing a second star because it didn't run or melt in extreme heat and humidity, but was still quick to remove â€” which I can't say for some other tubing mascaras.
faceoff_negative.headline: IDK how anyone likes this
